Class ReportContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kulana.core.foundation.report.ReportContext

  • public class ReportContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility that works with reporting folders for test artifacts population.
    Author:
    Alex Khursevich

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseDir

        public static java.io.File getBaseDir()
        Crates new screenshot directory at first call otherwise returns created directory. Directory is specific for any new test suite launch.
        Returns:
        root screenshot folder for test launch.

      • getTempDir

        public static java.io.File getTempDir()

      • getTestDir

        Crates new screenshot directory at first call otherwise returns created directory. Directory is specific for any new test launch.
        Parameters:
        test - name of test.
        Returns:
        test screenshot folder.
